rows.label: tlk41300022_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Hey, it's you. Are you
joining the self-defense
corps? ...Haha, just kidding.

rows.label: tlk41300022_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard from an acquaintance in Superbia
that something called an Artificial
Blade was being secretly made.

rows.label: tlk41300022_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I heard you don't need to
resonate with Artificial Blades.
I wonder if that's true...

rows.label: tlk41300022_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I'd love for one to be my
Blade and help out the corps...
We're that short-staffed.
